newsitem.title: HUNGARY: Hungary to offer HUF5bln 7-yr bonds on July 3. [CORRECTED 17:00 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Hungary to offer HUF5bln 7-yr bonds on July 3. [CORRECTED 17:00 GMT]

text.p: (Corrects maturity and date of auction in headline).
Hungary will auction five billion forint worth of the seven-year government bonds of 2004/F series on July 3, the Government Debt Management Agency (AKK) said on Tuesday.

NOTE - The bond bears a floating interest, calculated every half year, adding three percent to year-on-year consumer inflation. The interest is paid once a year, on March 24. The starting interest is 20.7 percent.
